original_title: Liebesgrüße aus der Lederhose 3: Sex-Express in Oberbayern
overview: After the government decides to incorporate the town of Entenbach into the town of Almendingen the two towns engage in a battle of pranks in order to lure tourists away from each other and change those plans.
title: Liebesgrüße aus der Lederhose 3: Sex-Express in Oberbayern
